alert.note: Alert for Linn; Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 10:33AM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. While snow accumulations are expected to remain less than an inch, visibilities may be significantly reduced at times in falling snow creating hazardous travel conditions. * WHERE...In Kansas, Miami and Linn KS Counties. In Missouri, Cass and Bates Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
